nodes.label: Start
utterances: Hello! I'm here to help you plan and book your travel itinerary. Where would you like to go?

nodes.label: Select Destination
utterances: Great choice! We have several destinations available such as Paris, Tokyo, New York, and Sydney. Which one do you prefer?

nodes.label: Book Flight
utterances: What type of flight would you prefer? We offer budget airlines, premium airlines, direct flights, and options with layovers.

nodes.label: Book Hotel
utterances: What kind of accommodation do you prefer? We have hotels, hostels, vacation rentals, 3-star, 5-star, and boutique options.

nodes.label: Rent Car
utterances: Would you like to rent a car? We have economy, SUV, and luxury options available.

nodes.label: Select Tours
utterances: What types of tours are you interested in? We offer guided tours, cultural excursions, nature trips, day trips, and must-see attractions.

nodes.label: Review Itinerary
utterances: Here's your itinerary: [details]. Would you like to make any changes or confirm it?

nodes.label: Make Changes
utterances: Sure, what would you like to change? You can modify your destination, flight, hotel, car rental, or tours.

nodes.label: Confirm Itinerary
utterances: Great! Your itinerary is confirmed. Would you like to proceed to payment?

nodes.label: Make Payment
utterances: Please choose your payment method: Credit card, PayPal, or bank transfer.

nodes.label: Exit
utterances: I'm sorry to see you go. If you have any other questions, feel free to reach out!

nodes.label: Handle Error
utterances: I'm sorry, I didn't understand that. Could you please clarify?

nodes.label: Success
utterances: Your travel itinerary has been successfully booked! Have a great trip!

nodes.label: Welcome
utterances: Hello! Welcome to our store. How can I assist you today?
Hi there! Welcome to our e-commerce platform. What would you like to do today?

nodes.label: Initiate Shopping
utterances: Great! Let's get started with your shopping.
Sure thing! What are you looking to purchase today?

nodes.label: Select Category
utterances: Please select a product category from the following options: electronics, clothing, home goods.
Which category are you interested in? We have electronics, clothing, and home goods.

nodes.label: Provide Product Details
utterances: Can you provide more details about the product you're interested in?
Please share some specifics about the product you want to buy.

nodes.label: Customize Product
utterances: How would you like to customize your product?
Let's customize your product. Please choose your options.

nodes.label: Add to Cart
utterances: Would you like to add this product to your cart?
Shall I add this item to your shopping cart?

nodes.label: Decide Shopping Flow
utterances: Would you like to continue shopping or proceed to checkout?
Do you want to keep shopping or go to the checkout process?

nodes.label: Apply Discount
utterances: Do you have a discount code you'd like to apply?
Would you like to enter a discount code for your purchase?

nodes.label: Choose Shipping
utterances: Please choose a shipping option: standard, express, or same-day.
Select your preferred shipping method: standard, express, or same-day delivery.

nodes.label: Select Payment Method
utterances: How would you like to pay? We accept credit card, PayPal, and other methods.
Please select a payment method: credit card, PayPal, or others.

nodes.label: Confirm Order
utterances: Please confirm your order details.
Can you confirm that all the information is correct before we proceed?

nodes.label: Complete Purchase
utterances: Thank you for your purchase! Your order has been placed successfully.
Your order is confirmed. Thank you for shopping with us!

nodes.label: Error Handling
utterances: I'm sorry, I didn't understand that. Could you please clarify?
Oops! Something went wrong. Can you please rephrase your request?

nodes.label: Browse More
utterances: Would you like to browse more products?
Do you want to look at additional items?

nodes.label: Intro
utterances: Hello! Welcome to our medical appointment scheduling service. How can I assist you today?

nodes.label: Schedule Appointment
utterances: Sure, let's schedule your appointment. What is the reason for your visit?

nodes.label: Reschedule Appointment
utterances: I can help you reschedule your appointment. Please provide the new preferred time.

nodes.label: Cancel Appointment
utterances: I'm sorry to hear you want to cancel your appointment. Can you please confirm?

nodes.label: Follow Up Services
utterances: Sure, we offer various follow-up services. How can I assist you with them?

nodes.label: Provide Reason for Visit
utterances: Thank you. Please select the type of doctor you would like to see: GPs, pediatricians, specialists, dermatologist, cardiologist.

nodes.label: Choose Doctor Type
utterances: Great choice. Please select an available time slot: Tuesday at 10 AM, Thursday afternoon, Friday morning, next Monday at 9 AM or 3 PM.

nodes.label: Select Time
utterances: Please provide your contact information to complete the scheduling.

nodes.label: Provide Contact Info
utterances: Thank you. Please confirm your appointment details.

nodes.label: Confirm Appointment
utterances: Your appointment has been scheduled successfully. Is there anything else I can help you with?

nodes.label: Info Clarification
utterances: I'm sorry, I didn't understand that. Could you please clarify?

nodes.label: Cancel Confirmation
utterances: Your appointment has been canceled successfully. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

nodes.label: Escalate to Agent
utterances: I'm transferring you to a support agent for further assistance.

nodes.label: intro_university
utterances: Welcome to University Admissions Assistance. How may I assist you with your enrollment today?

nodes.label: program_selection
utterances: Which program are you interested in? We offer Arts, Science, Engineering, and Business.

nodes.label: application_requirements
utterances: To apply for the selected program, please ensure you have your transcripts, test scores, and references ready.

nodes.label: document_upload
utterances: Please upload the required documents to proceed with your application.

nodes.label: payment_processing
utterances: The application fee is $50. How would you like to make the payment?

nodes.label: scholarship_inquiry
utterances: Would you like to inquire about available scholarships?

nodes.label: eligibility_check
utterances: Let me check your eligibility based on the provided information.

nodes.label: offer_confirmation
utterances: Congratulations! You have been accepted. Do you accept the admission offer?

nodes.label: alternative_options
utterances: If you're not satisfied with the current options, would you like to explore alternative programs?

nodes.label: end
utterances: Thank you for using University Admissions Assistance. If you need further help, feel free to reach out.

nodes.label: Greet Planner
utterances: Hello! I'm here to help you plan your event. What type of event are you organizing?

nodes.label: Specify Event Type
utterances: Great choice! How many guests are you expecting?

nodes.label: Provide Guest Count
utterances: Thank you. Let's select a venue. Do you have a preferred location?

nodes.label: Select Venue
utterances: Excellent. What type of catering would you like?

nodes.label: Choose Catering
utterances: Sounds good. What kind of entertainment are you considering?

nodes.label: Choose Entertainment
utterances: Got it. What is your budget range for the event?

nodes.label: Set Budget
utterances: Would you like to add any extra services?

nodes.label: Request Extra Services
utterances: Let's review your event plan. Does everything look good?

nodes.label: Review Plan
utterances: Please confirm your event plan to proceed with payment.

nodes.label: Confirm Plan
utterances: Thank you! Please proceed to make the payment to finalize your event planning.

nodes.label: Make Payment
utterances: Your event has been successfully planned and payment received. Have a great event!

nodes.label: End Dialog
utterances: If you need any further assistance, feel free to reach out. Goodbye!

nodes.label: culture_greeting
utterances: Hello! Let's explore different cultures and traditions together. What would you like to talk about today?

nodes.label: choose_topic
utterances: Great! Which aspect are you interested in? Festivals, food traditions, language aspects, or cultural challenges?

nodes.label: discuss_festivals
utterances: Festivals are a wonderful way to celebrate culture! Any you're curious about?
Want to explore major celebrations like Diwali, Chinese New Year, or Oktoberfest?
Which cultural festivals fascinate you the most?

nodes.label: discuss_food_traditions
utterances: Food traditions vary so much around the world! Shall we talk about traditional meals or dining etiquette?
Interested in discussing traditional dishes or how different cultures enjoy their food?
Food can be a window into culture. Shall we dive into that?

nodes.label: discuss_language_aspects
utterances: Language shapes so much of a culture! Interested in discussing linguistic differences?
We can also touch upon how language shapes culture if you'd like.
Shall we explore dialects, writing systems, or language families?

nodes.label: discuss_cultural_challenges
utterances: Some travelers face culture shock. Thoughts on dealing with that?
Have you encountered any challenges adapting to new customs?
We can chat about navigating cultural differences. Interested?

nodes.label: compare_cultures
utterances: Comparing cultures can be really insightful! Which cultures are you interested in comparing?
Let’s delve into how different cultures approach similar traditions.
What aspects of different cultures would you like to compare?

nodes.label: wrap_up
utterances: It was great exploring cultures with you! If you have more questions later, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
Thanks for the chat about global cultures and traditions. Take care!
Glad we could discuss different cultures today. Come back anytime you want to explore more!

Tell me about different cultures.
Let’s explore global traditions.
Let’s talk about festivals.

Tell me about cultural festivals.
Let’s talk about food traditions.

Tell me about traditional meals.
Let’s talk about language aspects.

Let’s talk about cultural challenges.

Tell me how cultures differ.
I’d like to wrap up.
Let’s end the conversation.
That’s all for now.

Let’s discuss something else.
Tell me about a different aspect.

Let’s discuss something else.
Tell me about a different aspect.

Let’s discuss something else.
Tell me about a different aspect.

Let’s discuss something else.
Tell me about a different aspect.

nodes.label: music_intro
utterances: Hey there! Let's dive into your music composition journey. What genre are you working with?
Hello! I'm excited to chat about your music creation. Which genre are you into?

nodes.label: specify_genre
utterances: Awesome choice! Do you focus more on acoustic, electronic, or a blend of instruments?
Great genre! What kind of instrumentation do you prefer: acoustic, electronic, or a mix?

nodes.label: specify_instrumentation
utterances: Interesting! Let's talk about your lyrics. What's the main theme you're exploring?
Cool setup! How would you describe your lyrical style?

nodes.label: discuss_lyrics
utterances: Nice! How do you structure your songs? Do you go with verse-chorus, ABAB, or something else?
Got it! What's your preferred song structure?

nodes.label: discuss_song_structure
utterances: Sounds good! Do you usually compose solo or collaborate with others?
Great! Are you a solo artist or do you work with collaborators?

nodes.label: collaborate
utterances: Excellent! What production tools do you use for your tracks?
Nice! Which production software are you working with?

nodes.label: specify_production_tools
utterances: Got it. What challenges are you currently facing in your music production?
Understood. What are the main obstacles you're encountering?

nodes.label: discuss_challenges
utterances: Thanks for sharing! Do you need any advice on overcoming these challenges?
I appreciate the insight! Would you like some tips to tackle these issues?

nodes.label: request_advice
utterances: Absolutely! Let's work through that together.
Sure thing! Here's how you can approach it.

nodes.label: end_conversation
utterances: It was great chatting with you about your music! If you need anything else, feel free to reach out.
Thanks for sharing your music journey! Wish you all the best with your compositions.

nodes.label: loop_topics
utterances: Would you like to revisit any topics or discuss something else?
Do you want to go over any other areas or continue our conversation?
I'd like to specify my genre.
Let's talk about the genre I'm working with.
I'd like to specify my instrumentation.
Let's discuss the instruments I'm using.

Let's talk about my lyrical themes.

Thank you, that was helpful.
I appreciate the advice. Let's end the conversation.

Can we loop back to something else?

I'd like to specify my genre again.
No, I'd like to end the conversation.
Let's wrap things up.

nodes.label: movie_intro
utterances: Hello! Let's dive into some movie discussions. What aspect would you like to explore today?
Hi there! I'm excited to talk about movies. Which topic interests you?

nodes.label: discuss_genre
utterances: Great choice! Which genre are you interested in discussing?
Sure, let's talk about genres. Do you have a specific one in mind?

nodes.label: discuss_director
utterances: Awesome! Which director's work would you like to analyze?
Sure thing! Is there a particular director you're interested in?

nodes.label: discuss_plot
utterances: Let's delve into the plot. Which movie's storyline would you like to discuss?
Plot analysis coming right up! Which film are we focusing on?

nodes.label: discuss_character
utterances: Characters are fascinating! Which character development would you like to explore?
Sure, let's discuss character development. Any particular character in mind?

nodes.label: discuss_cinematography
utterances: Cinematography can make or break a film. Which movie's visual style do you want to examine?
Let's talk about cinematography. Any specific films you're interested in?

nodes.label: discuss_soundtrack
utterances: Soundtracks add so much to a movie. Which film's music would you like to discuss?
Let's dive into soundtracks. Any particular movie you're thinking of?

nodes.label: discuss_critic_rating
utterances: Critic ratings can offer valuable insights. Which movie's reviews are you interested in?
Let's analyze critic ratings. Any specific films on your mind?

nodes.label: compare_films
utterances: Comparing films is always interesting. Which movies would you like to compare?
Let's compare some films. Do you have any titles in mind?

nodes.label: topic_loop
utterances: Would you like to revisit a previous topic or explore something new?
Do you want to go back to a different topic or continue with another aspect?

nodes.label: close_chat
utterances: It was great discussing movies with you! If you'd like to talk again, feel free to reach out.
Thanks for the conversation! Have a wonderful day ahead.

nodes.label: fantasy_start
utterances: Hello! Let's build your fantasy world together. What would you like to start with?
Welcome to the Fantasy World Builder! How can I assist you today?

nodes.label: define_setting
utterances: What kind of fantasy world intrigues you? Medieval, steampunk, or high-magic?
Let's outline the setting: ancient kingdom, space-fantasy, or mystical forest?
We can shape a realm. Any starting concept in mind—elves, dragons, or clockwork robots?

nodes.label: create_character
utterances: Who is our protagonist—knight, mage, rogue, or something else?
Want to design a unique hero or a band of adventurers?
Shall we outline a solitary warrior, or a party of misfits with special skills?

nodes.label: define_magic
utterances: Is magic abundant or rare? Are there any costs or risks to using it?
We can define if spells require components, incantations, or inherent power.
How structured is magic? Rigidly studied or wild and chaotic?

nodes.label: outline_quest
utterances: What sparks our hero’s journey—an evil overlord, a lost relic, or political intrigue?
Shall we create a grand quest or smaller episodic adventures?
Any plot catalysts you envision for this fantasy story?

nodes.label: create_villain
utterances: Every quest needs opposition. Who’s the antagonist—dark sorcerer, cunning warlord, or cursed deity?
Is the villain sympathetic or purely evil? Motivations matter.
Let’s craft a memorable villain. Cruel tyrant or tragic antihero?

nodes.label: add_factions
utterances: Are there different kingdoms or guilds with unique goals?
We can add factions: thieves’ guilds, knightly orders, or merchant clans. Thoughts?
Would politics or alliances be a big factor in this world?

nodes.label: add_side_stories
utterances: Shall we add side quests or subplots, like a dragon’s curse or a haunted forest?
We can create personal arcs for supporting characters. Interested?
Any secondary storyline to enrich the world?

nodes.label: role_play_scenario
utterances: We can continue expanding this story or role-play scenarios. Ready?
Want to delve deeper into a specific story arc or keep building the setting?
Shall we role-play as the hero or NPCs, or refine the lore more?

nodes.label: conclude_conversation
utterances: Great! Your fantasy world is taking shape. Anything else you'd like to add?
I'm glad we could build this world together. Let me know if you need anything else!
Your world-building session is complete. Have fun with your story!

nodes.label: end_fantasy
utterances: Thank you for using the Fantasy World Builder. Goodbye!
Hope to collaborate with you again on your next adventure!
Farewell! May your stories be epic and your worlds rich.
